# A brown tablet prepared from Folium Crataegi. It is used in [[traditional Chinese medicine]] to activate blood circulation and remove blood stasis, to dredge the vessels in the heart, and to regulate the flow of [[qi]] and dredge the meridian passages, in the treatment of the stagnation of [[qi]], blood stasis, a choking sensation in the chest, palpitation, amnesia, dizziness, tinnitus, coronary heart disease, angina pectoris, hyperlipemia, and ischemia of cerebral arteries.
